code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./App.css';import{observer}from"mobx-react-lite";import{Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import LogInPage from'./pages/LogInPage';import{SignUpPage}from'./pages/SignUpPage';import{BrandPage}from'./pages/BrandPage';import{StoreContext}from'./store/StoreContext';import{HomePage}from'./pages/HomePage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthRoutes=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/brand",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrandPage,{})})]});};const PublicRoutes=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogInPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/signup",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUpPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{})})]});};const App=()=>{const{store}=useContext(StoreContext);const isAuthenticated=store.isAuth;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:isAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthRoutes,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PublicRoutes,{})});};export default observer(App);
